summary: BRAKE ROTORS AND PADS REPLACED EVERY 3,000-4,000 MILES...THE LAST TIME VEHICLE WAS TAKEN FOR PROBLEM, THE ROTORS, PADS AND CALIPERS WERE REPLACED. DEALER CLAIMED IT WAS DRIVER ABUSE FOR PREMATURE WEAR OF BRAKE PARTS...I WAS FURIOUS!  NOW AFTER 4,000 MILES. BRAKES ARE SHOT...VIOLENT STEERING WHEN APPLYING BRAKES AT 50+....  *JB
